collections.name: Daily Inspiration
collections.description: Start your day with motivational quotes from visionary leaders and thinkers.
collections.author: Quips Editorial
previewQuotes: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.

collections.name: Stoic Wisdom
collections.description: Timeless philosophy from Marcus Aurelius, Seneca, and Epictetus to guide your life.
collections.author: Quips Editorial
previewQuotes: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.

collections.name: Creative Minds
collections.description: Insights on creativity and innovation from artists, writers, and inventors.
collections.author: Quips Editorial
previewQuotes: Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world.
Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once we grow up.

collections.name: Tech Visionaries
collections.description: Words of wisdom from the pioneers who shaped our digital world.
collections.author: Quips Editorial
previewQuotes: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.

collections.name: Literary Classics
collections.description: Memorable lines from the greatest works of literature throughout history.
collections.author: Quips Editorial
previewQuotes: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.
All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.

collections.name: Mindfulness & Peace
collections.description: Calming quotes about presence, meditation, and inner peace.
collections.author: Quips Editorial
previewQuotes: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
